name: Days Inn Mt. Vernon

reviews.text: We spent four nights there and enjoyed our stay. The place was quiet, a big item on our list of musts. No Interstate roar. The staff was most courteous and the breakfasts offered wonderful make-your-own waffles. We certainly will stay there again.
reviews.title: A quiet place

reviews.text: I stayed here for 2 nights in August. It wasn't my first choice but beggars can't be choosers and there was no other place in the area to stay.
reviews.title: Okay, not great

reviews.text: Anyway, I will start w/the positive. The lobby area is nice looking. The staff that I encountered throughout the stay were very friendly and accomodating to me (I forgot my shaver and they provided one for me free). The smell of the rooms was very pleasant. The beds were ok, not bad but not wonderful. The room itself was clean looking (paint job ect). The shower pressure was really nice. They seemed to have a nice breakfast, not like a buffet but it had a decent selection of items. Also, they are located near all kinds of shopping and there is a great Mexican restaurant next door.
reviews.title: Worst Place Ever! Strange charges on charge card

likes.disliked: — Everything about our stay was horrible.

reviews.text: As for the not so positive.....the rooms are supposed to have internet, but you can only get it in the lobby (we had this same issue 2 years ago when we stayed here). We were not the only ones unhappy w/that. Also there is a chair and ottoman that blocks the flow of the air conditioner, so you need to move it to really feel the coolness of it which is kind of a pain in the rear. Even though the shower pressure is good the hot water was not great at all both days. It would be turned up as hot as it can go, and it eventually got cold after like 3 minutes. The TV reception was ok, but it was scrambled on most stations. Also when you wake up you can hear the maids and the other guests slamming doors ect.
reviews.title: Never Again!! Stay Away!

likes.disliked: — Hotel owner and front desk clerks

reviews.text: I wouldn't complain so much about this place if the price was decent, but it was quite spendy for what we got. Had the price been more reasonable, I would have not been bothered by most of the not so positive things about this place.
reviews.title: Terrible terrible hotel

likes.liked: — very run down and smelled badly

reviews.text: would NOT recommend this place. For $84 I thought we would go there, as other places nearby were $10--20 more. It is very old, and did not seem very clean. Front desk hardly greeted or talked to us when we arrived. Gave us a room on 1st floor--very dark and creepy with big stains on the easy chair. Asked for a room upstairs, and it was somewhat better. Bathroom updated nicely, but so tiny, hardly room to close the door. Had 2 beds, but one was SO lumpy and you could spring up and down as you sat on it. My daughter almost had to share my bed with me. If we hadn't paid in advance, I would have left right away.
reviews.title: would NOT recommend this place

reviews.text: After check-out, we had a tour of Best Western Cotton something down the road. BEAUTIFUL, and only $10 more a nite, with BCAA or CAA discount. We learned and we will stay THERE next time.!!
reviews.title: I thought my company was punishing me!
Nicest Days Inn I've ever stayed in!!!
reviews.text: I did NOT remove my shoes the entire time that I was here, 3 days!!! This room was filthy! The front desk help was young, inexperienced and so therefore rude and obviously unhappy! The manager/owner was Asian and even given the chance, did not greet me in any way when I went in to the main lobby to check out.
Dip in the pool? No way , big construction project but, I did have 2 nights all alone in the jacuzzi.
reviews.title: The nicest Days Inn we ever stayed!
You have been warned!
reviews.text: This is a fair size motel, they assigned me the room that was the very farthest from the lobby, pool, well everything and for 2 of the three nights, I had neighbors when the rest of the motel was empty! Were they trying to control the bug population on the other cell blocks?

We chose this hotel for it's location, it's pool, and because it was pet friendly. The pics on the website looked nice enough. Don't be deceived! Fish eye lens used?! Were these pics taken when hotel first opened?!
reviews.title: Don't believe the pictures!!!!!

reviews.text: Negatives:
reviews.title: This motel is a seriously overpriced dump!

reviews.text: The pool is NOT heated and much smaller than it looks in the pic.
reviews.title: The website is a lie!

reviews.text: The beds are hard, the bathroom super tight, and the tv had poor reception on almost all channels. The area leaves something to be desired!
reviews.title: Poor customer service

reviews.text: We quickly left in the morning, skipping the continental breakfast, since we were all itchy and afraid the room was infested with either fleas or bed bugs!!!!
reviews.title: Don't stay at this hotel.

reviews.text: We needed a place to stay for a night on a road trip in Washington state and just drove in to this place, so I had not seen all the negative reviews prior to writing this one. We found the price to be good and the staff friendly and helpful at check-in and check-out. The room was nice and clean. and big. We liked the thermostat on the heating unit--digitally controlled, not just a knob with arrows indicating cooler/warmer. The temperature was even and we slept well--we had fought being too hot or just freezing in most places we stayed. We are budget travelers and felt like this place was great for us for a night.
reviews.title: Good for us
Housekeeping kept what was left in room
reviews.text: My husband left his Sonicare toothbrush in the room. When I called, at first I was told there was no one to speak with, then someone got on the phone and said that they had no record of anything being left in the room. I said that was incorrect, and the person said that they didn't think so.
So, if you stay there, don't leave a $100 toothbrush because their employees are dishonest.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: Nice hotel, tidy, good receptionist, a lovely Christmas tree. Felt welcoming. Waffles for breakfast, Which we always love. Recently painted room. The bed was not really comfortable, and I hate tiny pillows and tiny towels, but otherwise ... Great!!
reviews.title: This hotels manager is completely incompetent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is trash, if i were you i would stay far far away, I found bugs in my room. Then the manager had the guts to tell me that I must have brought them in. I would not stay here.
reviews.title: No Wireless in Room

aka: Days Inn Mt. Vernon Hotel Mount Vernon
